title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Jan 27 MO [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Monday, 27 January 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On the Monday, January 27 transmission of The Alex Jones Show, Alex continues breaking down the actions shaping the executive branch into a dictatorial office, including Obama's purge of political dissenters, censorship of Ted Cruz's comments on Dinesh D'Souza and continued threats to work without Congress to pass legislation. 

Alex also reviews HSBC's capitol controls, and the IMF's recommendation for the Fed to continue its detrimental stimulus policy. 

On today's show, Alex welcomes Steve Simmons, one of the sailor's involved in Fukushima decontamination operations, along with his attorney Paul C. Garner, to summarize the debilitating health effects he and others have experienced immediately following the cleanup. 

Alex also invites Project Veritas founder James O'Keefe to discuss his latest undercover infiltration, in which he exposes deeply offensive comments made by members of Battleground Texas.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
